channel.title: How do i get my Server Online..? So that others can join?
channel.description: My server is basically complete and i want to host it now..How do i make it so that other people can join my server and play on it as well?

item.title: How do i get my Server Online..? So that others can join?
item.dc:creator: @jay689 jay689
item.description:
@jay689 wrote:

ok, you need to port forward, and btw your ip is NOT 127.0.0.1

ok, to port forward, the easiest and from my point of view the best way to do it would be for you to download utorront,
just get anyversion i guess cant see the version mattering, then install it, if you dont know were too look use your best friend, google
too search for u torront.

Once youve got it, open it up and do either “Cntrl P” or the following: in the uTorront Toolbar find The “Options” toolbar, Once You’ve found it look for
“Perferances”, once in that a box will come up, you will need to do the following with the box;

Enable UPnP port mapping
Enable Nat-PMP port mapping
Enable Add uTorront to Windows Firewalls exceptions (Windows XP SP2 or later only)
And for “port used for incoming connections” put it as “43594”

Now, Close uTorront, And In The Bottem Left Toolbar, Were You’ll Find The Volume And That, Find uTorront, Right Click, And Click Exit

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get my Server Online..? So that others can join?

item.title: How do i get my Server Online..? So that others can join?
item.dc:creator: @byby1310 byby1310
item.description:
@byby1310 wrote:

Hello Moparnoob,

go to rs2 server tutorials, and a sticky in there is “how to make a server” read it and do everything it says or it won’t work.

eDIT: i have a feeling someone is going to call me a moparnoob, but i’ve been here for years but never posted, postcount isn’t everything.

Read full topic
